attributes.action: Sack Hazel Blears and save the Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hazel Blears is a corrupt politician whose attitude and response to the expenses scandal has hugely undermined the credibility of the Government.  Weak action by Gordon Brown in relation to Hazel Blears has contributed massively to the current weak position of Labour.  It may already be too late.  But Gordon Brown may be able to salvage something by acting now.

rejection.details: Hazel Blears resigned her Cabinet post on 3 June 2009.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
